thread.title: Onelia
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Onelia

author: Onelia
title: Onelia
text:
Can't say enough how much I enjoy working on my puzzles. As a senior citizen, living upstate enduring the cold & long winters with nothing to do outdoors, I'd sit for hours on my computer or watching TV. Not Good.
I stumbled upon Mountain Puzzles, fell in love with all the beautiful puzzles, ordered, and WOW. What excitement when I finally completed my first one. Ordered a second and can't wait for my 3rd. By the way, it's therapeutic too, keeps your mind focused.
